com.github.fge.jsonschema.util
Class JacksonUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.github.fge.jsonschema.util.JacksonUtils

public final class JacksonUtils
extends Object

Utility class for Jackson

This class provides a custom JsonNodeFactory and ObjectReader which you should use preferably to your own (in particular, the reader ensures that decimal values are read using BigDecimal.
